name: Youtube Downloader Bot
description: A bot that can download video or audio from video websites.

AUDIO_THUMBNAIL.description: If you need to use custom thumbnail for audio files, get telegraph url of your thumbnail and put here. If not keep No

VIDEO_THUMBNAIL.description: If you need to use custom thumbnail for video files, get telegraph url of your thumbnail and put it here. If not keep No

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Your channel username without @ to force users to join your channel before use the bot (You must add the bot to your channel as admin)
